title: Strengthening Critical Thinking in the AI Era: Digital Literacy Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic AI technologies and internet utilization skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on improving information analysis skills while managing cognitive fatigue in AI-dependent modern learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain a three-stage verification framework for evaluating the reliability of AI-generated information.
Learners can utilize a self-diagnostic tool to measure cognitive fatigue during digital content consumption.
Learners can design a problem-solving process that proposes creative alternatives beyond AI-provided solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
